item.title: Demonstration of DOCX support in calibre
item.dc:creator: Emre Erçin
item.description: This document demonstrates the ability of the calibre DOCX Input plugin to convert the various typographic features in a Microsoft Word (2007 and newer) document. Convert this document to a modern ebook format, such as AZW3 for Kindles or EPUB for other ebook readers, to see it in action.
